EmailTemplate.subject: How can digital branches drive better consumer engagement?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Customers’ expectations of their bank branch and the experiences they expect are constantly evolving. That means Wells Fargo must evolve too. The idea of a digital branch is swiftly becoming a reality as technology innovations make it possible to enable customers to do more and more at the self-service channel – indeed around 95% of traditional branch transactions can be done at the ATM. So, how can Wells Fargo take advantage of the digital branch model to reduce costs and improve customer experience?
